channel.title: [Delta][317] NPC HELP {PLEASE! :'(} (VIEW PLEASE!)
channel.description:
Revision: 317 Loading 317. Client Type: Delta (i personally like Delta, please don't say it sucks) Media: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2nin3b.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/15fouw6.jpg[/img]
Comments: I am making a quest about this npc "Kelvin" wants feathers and you go out and get them. But i want it so he only does it once after you give him the 100 feathers he wants. Also if you finish the quest he says "thanks for the feathers, bud." Also if you can help me with a part 2, where you finish the first part, he says he needs 10k more feathers now. Please help!!!
Extra Comments: No, Delta doesn;t suck thank Delta fore makign more rsps (pi, matrix, zenith, etc.)
Please just read and post if you can help :).

item.title: [Delta][317] NPC HELP {PLEASE! :'(} (VIEW PLEASE!)
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

use if statements for that, and use the npcdialogues methods.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta][317] NPC HELP {PLEASE! :'(} (VIEW PLEASE!)
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

I think you are using same codes like me so:
case ####:
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126(“Ahh you got the feathers I see. Ill take that.”, 4904);
deleteItem(FeatherID, 100);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
after that (OR your code)
add another one like this:
case ####:
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126(“Oh thank you. Here’s your reward. 100k”, 4904);
addItem(995, 100000);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
Is this what you want bro?
and personally i like delta too, a clean one so i can code like i want.

[size=18pt]EDIT [/size]: Maybe use like this
case ####:
if(playerHasItemAmount(FeatherId, 100)){
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126(“Ahh you got the feathers I see. Ill take that.”, 4904);
deleteItem(FeatherID, 100);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}else{
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126(“Did you got me the feathers??”, 4904);
deleteItem(FeatherID, 100);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}
break;

Read full topic
